title: Keratin hydrolysate as a chrome exhaust aid and keratin filler in leather processing: A cleaner technology approach for tannery solid waste management and leather manufacturing
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Ashagrie Mengistu, Kenatu Angassa, Israel Tessema, Getaneh Andualem, Bereket Yiheyes, Daniel Berhane, Mikiyas Abewaa, Mulat Kassie, Berhanu Telay
